data.description: Data associated with the status event, containing details about the current state of playback, network, and device.

airplay.description: Indicates whether AirPlay is currently active.

bandwidth.description: The available bandwidth in bits per second.

bitrate.description: The bitrate of the content being played in bits per second.

buffered_duration.description: The duration of the content currently available in the buffer, in milliseconds.

duration.description: The content duration, as retrieved from the playlist, in milliseconds.

playback_duration.description: The duration of the playback session in milliseconds, measured in wall-clock time.

position.description: The current player position relative to the beginning of the playlist, in milliseconds. Negative values are admitted.

position_timestamp.description: The current player timestamp as retrieved from the playlist, in Unix milliseconds. This field may be omitted if not available.

stall.description: Information about playback stalls experienced during the session.

count.description: The total number of stalls experienced during the session.

duration.description: The total duration of stalls in milliseconds, measured in wall-clock time.

stream_type.description: The type of stream being played, either 'On-demand' or 'Live'.

subtitles.description: The subtitles language code (CC, subtitles or forced subtitles).

url.description: The URL of the content currently being played. This should describe the content as closely as possible, including media playlists or segment URLs if available.

event_name.description: The name of the event, which can be either 'STOP' or 'HEARTBEAT'.

session_id.description: A unique identifier for the session.

timestamp.description: The timestamp at the time the event is sent, in Unix milliseconds.

version.description: The version of the JSON format.
